<js>
json=[];
if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
for(i in list){
href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
index=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
}
JSON.stringify(json)</js>
$.[*]

<js>
json=[];
if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
for(i in list){
href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
index=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
}
JSON.stringify(json)</js>

<js>
json=[];
if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
for(i in list){
href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
index=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
}
JSON.stringify(json)</js>
